Package fr.univlille.iutinfo

Class Main

java.lang.Object
fr.univlille.iutinfo.Main
public class Main extends Object
The Main class is the entry point of the application. It extends the javafx.application.Application class and overrides the start method to display the main menu of the application.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method of the program. It is the entry point of the application.
      Parameters:
      args - The command line arguments passed to the program.

    • playGame

      public void playGame(int nbCol, int nbRow, double obstacle, int visibilite, boolean[] objets, String nomMonstre, String nomChasseur, boolean diagonal, boolean monsterAI, boolean hunterAI, boolean monsterDifficulty, boolean hunterDifficulty)
      This is the main method to launch the game, it creates all the necessary instances for the game and displaying of the game.
      Parameters:
      nbCol - the number of columns of the maze
      nbRow - the number of rows of the maze
      obstacle - the percentage of wall to remove in the maze
      visibilite - the visibility of the monster
      objets - the objects to put in the maze (not used for now)
      nomMonstre - the name of the monster
      nomChasseur - the name of the hunter
      diagonal - if the monster can move diagonally
      monsterAI - if the monster is controlled by an AI
      hunterAI - if the hunter is controlled by an AI

    • playGame

      public void playGame(String name, double obstacle, int visibilite, boolean[] objets, String nomMonstre, String nomChasseur, boolean diagonal, boolean monsterAI, boolean hunterAI, boolean monsterDifficulty, boolean hunterDifficulty, fr.univlille.iutinfo.view.MenuFXMLView menu)
      This is the main method to launch the game, it creates all the necessary instances for the game and displaying of the game. this is a second function for launching the game with precharged laby.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the maze
      obstacle - the percentage of wall to remove in the maze
      visibilite - the visibility of the monster
      objets - the objects to put in the maze (not used for now)
      nomMonstre - the name of the monster
      nomChasseur - the name of the hunter
      diagonal - if the monster can move diagonally
      monsterAI - if the monster is controlled by an AI
      hunterAI - if the hunter is controlled by an AI
